name: VA-11 Hall-A KIDS!

files.game: N/A: Please select the VA11HallAKIDS-1.1-linux.tar.bz2 file downloaded from https://sukebangames.itch.io/valhallakids

extract.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
files:
- game: 'N/A: Please select the VA11HallAKIDS-1.1-linux.tar.bz2 file downloaded from
    https://sukebangames.itch.io/valhallakids'
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/VA11HallAKIDS-1.1-linux/VA11HallAKIDS.sh
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: game
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/VA11HallAKIDS-1.1-linux/VA11HallAKIDS.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/VA11HallAKIDS-1.1-linux/lib/linux-x86_64/VA11HallAKIDS
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/VA11HallAKIDS-1.1-linux/lib/linux-i686/VA11HallAKIDS
require-binaries: tar
